name: Siphon (Kulu)
description:
Hell is draining you of your last bit of life. Delay your inevitable death by stealing souls to keep you alive.

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Primary Attack - LeftMouse
  • Secondary Attack - RightMouse
  • Jump / Double Jump - Space
  • Dash - E
  • Ground Pound - Q
  • Sprint - LeftShift

Made within Ludum Dare 50

Changelog

  • Fixed the audio issue in the web build
